scripts.use:whagons: ln -sfn configs/whagons config && echo 'Switched to whagons config'
scripts.use:nca: ln -sfn configs/nca config && echo 'Switched to nca config'
scripts.use:whagons5-widget: ln -sfn configs/whagons5-widget config && echo 'Switched to whagons5-widget config'
scripts.dev: npm run apply-config && cd web && npm run dev
scripts.dev:whagons: npm run use:whagons && npm run dev
scripts.dev:nca: npm run use:nca && npm run dev
scripts.dev:whagons5-widget: npm run use:whagons5-widget && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run apply-config && cd web && npm run build
